item.title: Thailand and Cambodia agree to 'immediate ceasefire'
item.description: US President Donald Trump threatened to pause tariff negotiations until the hostilities stopped.

item.title: Southern European heatwave fans multiple wildfires
item.description: Greece and Turkey are among the countries battling wildfires as temperatures spike in southern Europe.

item.title: Who are the winners and losers in US-EU trade deal?
item.description: Carmakers, consumers and European solidarity - a look at who is up and who is down due to the latest tariffs.

item.title: Five killed in Bangkok market mass shooting
item.description: Police say officers are investigating the motive behind the incident in Thailand's capital.
